Speakers We're pleased to announce this initial group of speakers for the conference

Roger Ver
CEO of Bitcoin.com

Keynote Speaker
2018 Satoshi's Vision Conference

Bitcoin’s usefulness as a store of value comes as a secondary effect from its usefulness as a medium of exchange. If you destroy the medium of exchange, you destroy the store of value." Roger Ver
CEO of Bitcoin.com , Bitcoin Investor

More speakers will be added in the coming weeks Check back soon for additional speakers.

Would you like to present?

Researchers, academics, developers, and enthusiasts are all welcome! Submissions should be 1-2 pages in length, and outline the topic of the proposed talk, why it is important, and a description of what the attendees will learn.

Proposals due Jan 20th 2018 – Please submit presentation proposals to: presentations@satoshisvisionconference.com
